description:
The schematics for this ship were created from a dormant Borg Cube found in Deep Space. The Ex-Borg used their ingenuity and their knowledge of Borg technology to bring that Cube back to life and to allow it to be replicated, albeit with a few key changes: this Borg Cube cannot assimilate its targets, and its power systems are centralized, allowing it to be manned by a conventional crew rather than a compliment of a hundred thousand drones.

The Ex-Borgs' work on the Borg Cube now allows Independents the galaxy over to experience the power of the Borg. Your enemies will flee before its advanced weaponry and will rue the day they ever presumed to challenge you.

ship_ability.title: Phase Discriminating Amplifier
ship_ability.description:
Base HHP Damage increases with Borg Cube tier. 

When targeting a ship above your player level, HHP Damage dealt is decreased by 10% per level.
